message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $180. I believe it offers exceptional value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your item's value, but I am only able to pay up to $150 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I see you recognize the value of this item. How about we meet in the middle at $165?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter your offer with $155 for the product. I hope this brings us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.
